text: @NYGovCuomo There’s no virus. Wake up. It’s RF Poisoning from 5G. Ask any infectious disease specialist/ virologist... there’s NO CONTAGIONS found in the test for Covid! Coronavirus is nothing but a common cold. Why is the state / govt paying docs $13k per Covid death? $39k w/ventilator?????
